alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued March 10 at 3:31PM MST until March 11 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Locations mainly west of the I-25 Corridor. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
